Description:
CONTEMPORARY HOUSE POSITIONED CLOSE TO A HOST OF AMENITIES
This Metricon build Single Storey Modern house, on 448sqm block of land with 14m frontage, has gorgeous rendered facade with a entrance portico and professionally designed front landscape.
There are 4 spacious bedrooms, in which the master bedroom has designer walk in robe, deluxe ensuite with double wash basin stone vanity counter top and other 3 bedrooms has its built in robes.
Stunning open plan Kitchen with 40mm stone bench top, polished tile splash back, 900mm stainless steel cooking appliances including oven , with a separate Walk in Pantry.
This modern house have multiple common areas including formal Living area (which can be converted into Study), a Family & Dining and Leisure/Rumpus areal all with wide windows welcoming natural light at every opportunity.
Separate is the bathroom with bathtub, shower, wash basin with stone vanity counter top and separate is Toilet; The Laundry room with cabinets and the Double Car Park Garage; None the less, the amazing outdoor area with concrete slab smooth finish and much more all your family needs.
Added features are contemporary light fittings & down lights with dimmer switch, Wooden Flooring to common areas, Tiles to wet areas and Carpet in rooms. Comforts include gas ducted heating system to all rooms.
Property Snapshot:
Formal Living area beside entrance (which can be converted into Study)
4 large bedrooms (1 Master Bed with Ensuite & WIR, 3 bedrooms with Built in Robes)
Family Area with feature wall
Dining Area
Kitchen with 40mm stone benchtop, 900mm stainless steel oven
Separate Walk in Pantry
Bathroom with bathtub, shower enclosure, wash basin with stone vanity counter top
Separate W.C./Toilet
Laundry room with storage cabinets
Leisure/Rumpus Room
Linen Cabinets
Alfresco
Double car-park Garage
Front landscape with finished concrete Driveway (rear landscape not included)
Ducted Heating System
Eliston offers a unique lifestyle including its own town centre with shops, cafes, a new primary school and childcare centre within safe strolling distance. A brilliant outdoor lifestyle awaits with 11ha of green space, 3 ovals and 4 parks, bike lanes, a train station on the way, fast internet access and a choice of block sizes in this beautiful, tranquil location.
A plentiful life planned around lifestyle amenities and outdoor spaces with plenty of established schools, shopping, transport and recreation nearby.
Life at Eliston is designed for sport with 3 major sports grounds providing cricket ovals, football fields and netball courts, along with an indoor sports facility and 3 recreational parklands
Youll love having major shopping centres like Westfield Fountain Gate and Cranbourne Park nearby, not to mention a planned town centre for Eliston residents.
Safe, Secure and stimulating learning environments for your child within 5 minutes drive is Casey Race, Clyde Primary School, St Peters College, Wilandra Rise Primary School etc.
MEET YOU DURING THE SCHEDULED OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS OR BOOK NOW FOR AN INSPECTION AS PER YOUR CONVENIENCE
Note:
Photo ID required at open for inspections.
Floor plans, photos are for representational purposes only and should be used as such; we accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained within.

Description:
75 squares of uncompromising, high-end designer living on 1 acre
Situated in the urban growth zone in Clyde this luxurious custom-built residence is the epitome of grand-scale family living. An opulent designer home sprawling 75squares boasts cutting edge designer proportions saturated in natural light and an abundance of features this property is sure to impress.
- 5 spacious bedrooms and 4 gorgeous bathrooms including stunning parents retreat
- Plenty of room for car/truck/trailer/caravan storage with 4 car garage plus massive 9 x 11m shed
- Showcasing stunning upgrades in the home including spotted gum hardwood floor, 9ft ceilings, granite benchtops and much more.
Delivering unprecedented excellence in a prime location close to major road arterials and main road frontage this is the perfect lifestyle property with ability to run a business from home or sit and wait for the further development of the land and potential to sub-divide.

Description:
NO PROGRESS PAYMENTS & HUGE STAMP DUTY SAVINGS
Located in the prestigious leafy suburb of Clyde, perfectly positioned between both a thriving city and stunning parklands, Parkview on Clyde offers the perfect combination of community and location.
With Melbourne's vibrant city just 48.1kms away, and Shopping on Clyde down the road, residents have plenty of options when it comes to shopping and dining out. A reliable bus and purposed future train network all within walking distance, making travelling to and from the estate a breeze.
This welcoming community offers a wide range of amenities and activities to enjoy, whilst being close to all the local conveniences you need to continue to live an active and low maintenance lifestyle.
A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need!
Now is the time to take advantage of these quality townhouses which are ideal to live in or for investment.
The amazing benefits of these townhouses are as follows:
• Directly opposite Clyde Primary School
• Within walking distance to the Proposed Clyde Town Centre and Clyde Train Station
• No progress payments
• No Plans for Body Corporate
• Fantastic Rental Income of $370 to $390 per week
• Maximum saving on stamp duty (conditions apply)
• Full advantage of tax depreciation
• Brand new property with upgraded inclusions
• Receive an additional $10,000 Government grant if you are a 1St home buyer
No progress payments!
This is a huge attraction and means up until completion, there will be no loan payments or any loss of money. For example, if you were to build a brand new house and land package with another builder, you will be paying progress payments and would be charged interest during the entire building stage. With Parkview On Clyde, this is not the case. All that is required is a 10% deposit once finance has been approved and the balance of money is only due once your townhouse is completed.
Once completed a tenant will be organised to move in.
Maximum saving on stamp duty!
When buying an established property you will be paying FULL stamp duty. This is not the case with Parkview On Clyde. Currently if purchasing an established investment property at $369,000 you will be paying approximately $18,200 in stamp duty. If purchasing off the plan at $369,000 you will be paying approximately $2,581 in stamp duty based on the Off The Plan Value (conditions apply). This is an instant saving of $15,619.
Using the Stamp Duty Calculator: https://www.nab.com.au/personal/loans/home-loans/calculators/stamp-duty-calculator#!#nab-loan-calc-results-stamp
(Casey Estate Agents will take no responsibility for accuracy or inaccuracy.)

Titled land ,Ready to Build !
This 400m2 registered block is surrounded by new & prestigious homes in Edgebrook estate. Offering a wide frontage to suit an array of building options, this is truly a great opportunity to build your dream home in an incredibly popular suburb.
- 12.5 m wide frontage, absolutely rectangular block
- 32 m side by side
- Perfect for Single or Double storey
- Registered & ready to commence construction
- Short Drive to upcoming Clyde Metro Train Station
This land represents an outstanding chance for you to create the ideal standard of family living in a booming suburb. Located close and well connected to schools, shops and transport amenities, this is the perfect foundation for your dream home.
For more information contact Anu 0431 112 923

Description:
MODERN LIVING IN PRIME LOCATION
Situated in the ever growing Eliston Estate is this spectacular four-bedroom home, complimented by a quality modern interior and external finishing's, this home is the perfect place to enjoy family living within such a convenient location.
The home offers a beautiful open plan living arrangement with stunning kitchen, plenty of bench and cupboard space, tiled splash back, quality stainless steel appliances, built in pantry, which overlooks both the light filled family/meals area and spacious living area.
Find an impressive master suite, boasting walk in robe and inviting ensuite, whilst remaining three out of four bedrooms are generously proportioned and complemented by built in robes and the stylish family bathroom.
Further Features included in this home are:
- Neutral colour scheme throughout
- Split system air conditioner
- Gas ducted heating
- Blinds throughout
- Double garage with internal access.
Eliston is an estate that is within a short drive to freeway access and all of the amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. You are also only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre! With additional shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club local amenities are always going to be close by, whilst the recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre offers an abundance of cafes and restaurants. Not to mention the proposed Cranbourne East train station and the existing ones situated right throughout the South East!

Description:
High Quality - Brand New Home - Ready To Move In.
This gorgeous and nearly perfect house will stun you with its modern and dazzling interior finishes.
The home has been well designed to incorporate everyone's needs. Once inside, the grand floor plan begins with an imposing wide entrance and striking high ceilings with its inviting living room perfectly placed to receive guests as they arrive. The master bedroom is inclusive of an ensuite and walk-in robe, along with three no-less impressive bedrooms all featuring generous proportions, family bathroom and separate toilet to accommodate. The open plan kitchen integrates with the dining and family room, the clever floor plan design ensures the hub of the home is central to all. Its hard to list all the indoor and outdoor features of this stunning home.
Located close to Primary and secondary schools like casey grammer, hillcrest, wilandra rise, st. thimas, st. peter's. High quality care for your children so that you can focus on your own health and well being. Close by Public transport and shopping centre. Life at Eliston is designed for sport with 3 major sports grounds providing cricket ovals, football fields and netball courts, along with an indoor sports facility and 3 recreational park lands.
Schedule a tour today!
Internal area
241m²

Description:
Freedom, Opportunity, Luxurious, Fulfill Your Life!
Harcourts Dandenong is proud to present 28sq, of perfection; this near new large single-level home on offer for the first time!
Situated in up and coming growing Belmond Estate it is the perfect home to turn the key, unpack your bags and start the new chapter of your life.
Sitting on 512sqm (approx) this is a fantastic opportunity for all buyers to get a foot into the market. Boasting all the aspects of sophisticated living as well as a user friendly atmosphere, this beautiful 4 bedroom 2 bathroom with multiple living zones home is a must see!
This property features:
- Large master bedroom with walk in robe, en-suite with dual vanity
- 3 additional generous bedrooms with built in robes
- Open plan chefs' kitchen with large caesarstone island benchtop, lounge and dining
- Multiple large living zones
- Theatre room
- Security camera & alarm system
- Treated merbau pine decked walkway
Additional features of this property include engineered flooring, soft close drawers, 900mm stainless steel gas cooktop and oven, butler's walk-in pantry with also added ample cabinetry storage, ducted heating and cooling, manicured front and back gardens plus more!
When you enter this home, you will notice a feeling of modern class, along with the comfortable energy of a family home.
Nestled in to an incredible pocket of Belmond Estate, within short walking distance to Bus Stops, Casey Fields, Casey Race with also schools in the area St Peters Clyde North Campus, Clyde Primary and St Thomas the Apostle Catholic Primary just to name a few.
Neighbouring shopping centres such as Shopping on Clyde and Cranbourne Park shopping Centre just a stone's throw away. Short distance to Cranbourne station for a commute or easy access to the South Gippsland Highway giving quick access to both the South East and Mornington area's.
Call Jayden or Michael to book an inspection before the property is sold!

Description:
Ideal first home or investment opportunity
Located in the popular Pasadena Estate sits this lovely 3 bedroom family home. Whether you're a first home buyer, investor or simply looking to down-size, here is an opportunity which should definitely not be missed!
Features include:
- Spacious master bedroom with its very own full ensuite & walk-in robe plus a further two secondary bedrooms which are both generous in size and feature double built-in robes
- The modern kitchen showcases stylish stainless steel appliances which includes a dishwasher in addition to stone benchtops and overlooks the spacious dining & family living zone
- Inside flows smoothly through to outside via glass sliding door from the family area. The covered entertainment zone has plenty of room for the fun summer barbeques while also providing a more intimate setting for a low key dinner party with your nearest & dearest.
- Further inclusions: neutral tones throughout, ducted heating, split system air conditioning, down lights, low maintenance gardens
The location is just perfect with parklands, Shopping on Clyde and bus services close by and with easy access to schools such as St. Peter's Secondary College, Wilandra Primary School & Clyde Primary School. What are you waiting for? Call Brent Day or Marsh Schwallie now to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Amazing Opportunity
The Eliston estate offers a quality built home, only about 18 months old, this great family home greets you with modern façade with low maintenance gardens and landscaping leading to the double garage and main entry.
Upon entry feel at home with wide hallways, Master bedroom located towards the front, large in size and fitted, generous shelved walk through robe into the ensuite.
Two conveniently located bedrooms with double BIRs nearby the main family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Open plan kitchen with SS appliances, 900mm cooktop, stone benches, walk-in pantry, overlooking the sunlit living and the dining.
Intuitive to the needs of a family, this stunning home offers a second living area, which can be used as a quiet area for relaxation, or as a space for daily family life to spread out into.
Extra Features-
Ducted heating
Internal garage access
Surveillance cameras
Split system air-con
Nothing to do but move in
From the moment you arrive, you quickly realise that Eliston is a one of a kind community. A place where you can create your ideal life, in the picturesque Clyde landscape. Clyde is located only a short drive from freeway access and all amenities in the townships of Berwick and Cranbourne.

Description:
From the Cradle to the home
Not just by its street name, but by definition is this the home that is a cradle for the budding investor and first home buyer alike. The perfect size for a young family with plenty of room to grow and expand, the property is situated within the fast developing suburb of Clyde. It's proximity to schools, parks and shopping amenities cannot be overlooked and with sports facilities with a 5 minute drive from home, taking the kids to practice will be a breeze.
Step into a modern, well-kept home with open plan living and furnished with all creature comforts such as ducted heating and split-system cooling, WIR and ensuite for the master bedroom, Bosch dishwasher and 5 burner gas cooktop. The home's hot water is supplied by a solar water heater. A large pantry in the kitchen area provides plenty of storage to keep the shopping trips to a minimum.
Think that's it? Just wait until you check out the garage with more than enough room for 2 cars and a workshop for the handymen out there. More of an entertainer? The undercover terrace provides you with shade in the summer and cover form the rain in winter, making it ideal to host your BBQ's in the summer or drink Gluhwein with your friends in winter.
Investors love the potential, first home buyers do too! Don't miss out on this ripper and get in touch with Metin Aziret today to arrange an inspection.
All information contained herein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.

Description:
Epic Carlisle home - 4 living areas on 584m2
Found in the gorgeous Pasadena Estate in Clyde, this modern Carlisle family home plays host to a premium lifestyle packed with extras and quality upgrades throughout. Boasting FOUR living spaces, modern neutral tones and a prime location this property is perfect to accommodate those looking for a floorplan with flexible living space and will tick every box.
Features include:
- Huge Master suite with spacious walk in robe and deluxe en-suite with spa bath, twin vanities, oversized shower and toilet.
- Three further generous bedrooms all fitted built in robes.
- FOUR living areas to enjoy these include a formal lounge, open plan living and dining area, kids retreat and at the rear an amazing theatre room for your movie nights in.
- Gorgeous designer kitchen featuring huge walk in pantry, two fridge spaces, breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances including 900mm oven and five burner cooktop, dishwasher, 40mm stone benches with waterfall ends and upgraded cabinetry.
- Fantastic alfresco for integrated outdoor entertaining.
- Generous backyard for kids and pets to play.
- Double lock up garage with internal access.
- Separate powder room for guests.
Some if the many EXTRAS include: Ducted heating throughout, split system A/C to Master bedroom, 6.5 Kilowatt solar panel system, established low maintenance gardens, ducted vacuum, raised ceiling throughout, double door entrance and much, much more!
And if all of this isn't enough wait until you see the location! Pasadena estate is the place to be due to a true family friendly lifestyle. Beautiful children's parks and walking tracks offer plenty of space to explore, Casey fields and Casey RACE are only a stone throw away and all this is only a moment's drive to local schools. Not to mention the property is also just a short walk to Shopping on Clyde. This home will literally fly out the door you MUST add it to your list!

Description:
Dream Home in Eliston Calling !!!
Goldbank Real Estate is proud to present titled block of land approx 400m2 in Clyde
Perfect to build your dream home in the sought after estate of "Eliston".
Close to beautiful parks, playgrounds, Clyde recreation centre, walking/bike tracks and proposed primary school. Close to future Clyde train station and future major town centre, short walk to Willandra Rise, Clyde primary school, Clyde and Selandra Rise shopping centre, Cranbourne Park shopping centre.
Lots of green open spaces, neighborhood parks, sporting fields, proposed indoor recreation centre etc.
This property is close to all the essentials that is required for a perfect location
If you are looking for a premium and highly sought-after location to build your dream home, then this land is for you.
Dimensions 12.65 m x 32 m
Goldbank Team welcomes you and looks forward to hearing from you.

Description:
Perfect Location, Perfect Block of Land to Build YOUR Dream Home !!!
Positioned in the high sort after and popular Edgebrook Estate, this generously sized block of vacant land is the perfect location for you to build your dream home. With its 14-meter FRONTAGE, you will be spoiled for choice in deciding on a plan for your next build.
A street away from the local playground this land is located on a quiet street, yet a few minutes away from the Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, Shopping on Clyde, Primary & Secondary Schools and the Casey Recreation and Aquatic Centre, this is the perfect location for you to call home.
Don't miss out, contact Shan on 0416 891 662 to schedule a private inspection of this land.

Description:
**SOLD BY PAUL RINGERI**
EDGEBROOK ESTATE, CLYDE: **FULLY TITLED & READY TO GO** Requiring an estate offering family-friendly living? Wanting to be within a brief drive to major shopping facilities and freeway access? This is definitely affordable buying for first timers so take advantage of the Government Grants on offer and buy with confidence today!
This low maintenance parcel of land offers an overall land size of 213m2 with a frontage of 8.5m. With plenty of award-winning designs to pick from any builder will have a huge selection of floor plans sure to suit your current situation.
Whether you are a young couple looking to break into the market, an established family needing extra room or someone who's seeking a lifestyle change it's all here at this thriving new development. Within Edgebrook there are planned parks with playgrounds, BBQ's and public artworks. It's an estate where community spirit will thrive. This vision will come to life with a carefully designed masterplan and future central park. Planned creek-front walkways and bikeways within the estate will encourage active lifestyles, whilst there are countless recreational and sporting facilities nearby.
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this outstanding opportunity is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre! With additional shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club local amenities are always going to be close by. Don't forget the recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre which offers an abundance of funky cafes and restaurants!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call today before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
CONTACT US TO ARRANGE FOR A TIME TO VIEW THE SECTION 32 VENDOR STATEMENT!
